comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: So what does this has to tell us, putting a link here without any further explanation or clarification on the purpose for doing this is just as nothing than spamming or posting off off topic post, you're a full member and by now you should have known how to made a quality post and not something like this, even though if it's what you have discovered, atleast say something informative about what you're posting.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: For real? You want those that are just joining your bitcoin “hacking” discussion forum to introduce themselves by adding their images? Please have the word “anonymous/pseudononymous” suddenly been removed from the dictionary? Aside from that, since this is considered a project that hopefully will grow if you’re able to do the needful and make some necessary adjustments then you should consider moving this thread to “project development” board.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on November 20, 2023, 06:48:04 PMFor real? You want those that are just joining your bitcoin “hacking” discussion forum to introduce themselves by adding their images? Please have the word “anonymous/pseudononymous” suddenly been removed from the dictionary? Not 100% sure, but I think this is just the default welcome message of Discourse forum software.But yea, OP at least create a decent description instead of just saying "A new site has arrived!" that links to an empty forum lmao.

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: So what is this? A forum for interested hackers? No explanation whatsoever.Ahh not really interested, let OP promote it, I don't think it's important because it's not really clear what he said.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: pbies on November 20, 2023, 06:18:47 PMLook:https://haxor.pl/Bitcoin wiki and forum.We saw. What to do next?You did the easier and simpler part of the job, registered the domain, installed two scripts and added the donation address.I am quite curious about the basic idea and what you want to achieve with this site. What exact problem did you recognize, and which will your service solve?

comments.author: Marvelman
comments.body: OP, seriously? This is a terrible excuse for introducing a new website! Don't get me wrong, some folks might click just 'cause theyre curious.  But that curiosity ain't gonna turn into real interest or anything meaningful ya know? You're not doing yourself any favors with this kind of hard sell.  More likely to turn people off than get them excited about what you're offering.  Id rethink the strategy if I were you.

comments.author: pbies
comments.body: All that complain - go to other places on the Internet, there is plenty of sites to watch.

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: Quote from: pbies on November 20, 2023, 07:45:46 PMAll that complain - go to other places on the Internet, there is plenty of sites to watch.This is not about making complaints, newbies are coming here everyday and no one is complaining against them as long as they know what they are doing, but in your own case, your course is not yet define, maybe more closer look should be taken on your profile for more possible lookouts, you're sounding weird and unusual, i hope it's not what am thinking, that this account got compromised or something.

comments.author: Marvelman
comments.body: Quote from: pbies on November 20, 2023, 07:45:46 PMAll that complain - go to other places on the Internet, there is plenty of sites to watch.First of all, this board isn't for shilling your stupid website.  So your post breaks the rules here.  And another thing - people can say what they want in response.  You gotta be open to feedback, good or bad.  If you can't handle some criticism then maybe you should take your business elsewhere on the Internet.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on November 20, 2023, 06:48:04 PMFor real? You want those that are just joining your bitcoin “hacking” discussion forum to introduce themselves by adding their images? Please have the word “anonymous/pseudononymous” suddenly been removed from the dictionary? Aside from that, since this is considered a project that hopefully will grow if you’re able to do the needful and make some necessary adjustments then you should consider moving this thread to “project development” board. Why is everything about the OP appearing all wrong, not necessarily the project but the presentation of itYou drop a link without explanations as to what it is, then someone visits the link, only to discover the platform requires a profile picture and a name in a world where anonymousity and pseudo-anonymousity is the order of the day. I think he needs to do better.

comments.author: pbies
comments.body: Even babies don't cry on the Internet like you guys.

comments.author: CCMS
comments.body: This is certainly going to be in my watchlist since it has many stuffs that I wanted to see for long . Though , I wouldn't suggest anyone to put real picture as privacy is important as well .
